title: The Face of Britain by Simon Schama, episode 4, review: 'quietly provocative'
text: TV and Radio reviews The Face of Britain by Simon Schama, episode 4, review: 'quietly provocative' From Leibovitz's John and Yoko, to Lewis Carroll's Alice, Simon Schama considered the allure of love portraits, says Benji Wilson 4 Simon Schama examined love portraits Photo: BBC By Benji Wilson
